parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description: The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

parameters.name: ProductCode
parameters.description: The code of the service to which the instance belongs.

parameters.name: RenewPeriod
parameters.description:
The duration of the subscription renewal. Unit: months. Valid values:

*   1 to 9
*   12
*   24
*   36
